fail_closed_principles: Any claim confidence <0.70 blocks automatic remediation; requires explicit human override
Ambiguous language defaults to REVIEW state (human gate required)
No silent changes; all modifications traced to directive + confidence score
Placement is frozen; only language affected, no file moves or renames
Complete before/after audit trail required for all changes

confidence_thresholds.explanation: Fail-closed on ambiguity: <0.70 blocks auto-remediation, 0.70-0.94 requires human review, 0.95+ auto-approvable
